text: Ergi Borshi (born 9 August 1995 in Shkodër) is an Albanian football player who plays as a centerback for KF Veleçiku.Soccerway profileFSHF profileVllaznia.al profile ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Shkodër Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Association football defenders Category:KF Vllaznia Shkodër players Category:KS Veleçiku Koplik players Category:KF Tërbuni Pukë players Category:KF Teuta Durrës players Category:KS Kastrioti players
title: Ergi Borshi
